pages.text: $(li)Diamond Chisel is the direct upgrade of the $(l:patchouli:tools/chisel/iron_chisel)Iron Chisel$(/l).$(br)$(li)This one has more durability and new features than the last one.
$(li)You can left click click on any Chisel compatible block to convert it into a Chiseled version.$(br)$(li)If you shift left click, the Chiseled block will rollback.

If you right click while you have the Diamond Chisel in your hand, you will see new modes in the GUI:$(br)$(li)Single: Chisel a single Block$(li)Panel: Chisel a 3x3 square of blocks$(li)Column: Chisel a 3x1 column of blocks$(li)Row: Chisel a 1x3 row of blocks.$(br2)This modes allows to you to Chisel more blocks when you left click in one block.
